div.head: 五絕死
div.div: the five cut-offs with [an appearance of] death

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: the five cut-offs with [an appearance of] death

sense.def: Alternative Names wu jue 五絕 , the five cut-offs; wu jue ji bing 五絕急病 , the five cut-offs with acute disease. Pathological Condition of a cu si 卒死 , appearance of death, resulting from five different types of accidents. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 28: 刪繁療五絕死方：一曰自縊 , 二曰牆壁所迮 , 三曰溺水 , 四曰魘魅 , 五曰產乳 , “The SF ’s recipe for curing the five cut-offs with [an ap pearance of] death , including, first, [appearance of death following] suicide by hanging; second, [appearance of death following being] crushed by a wall; third, [appearance of death because of] drowing; fourth, [appearance of death because of] nightmare seduction-specters; fifth, [appearance of death in the course of giving] birth. LSZ in Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 百病主治藥 Bai bing zhu zhi yao: 五絕：縊死、 溺死、壓死、凍死、驚死 , “The five cut-offs include [appearance of] death following suicide by hanging, [appearance of] death by drowing, [appearance of] death by being crushed, [appearance of] death from freezing, [appearance of] death from fright/shock”.
